short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to tip tokens launched on https://beliefs.social on X (prev. Twitter).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Beliefs Extension unlocks the next chapter of memecoin narrative.
Tip any memecoin created at Beliefs to any X (prev. Twitter) user with just a few clicks.

Designed by the engineering experts behind Beliefs, this extension offers a refined yet user-friendly approach to tipping tokens. 
Tipping tokens is an exclusive feature of coins launched at Beliefs that allows users to tip each other on Farcaster and X (prev. Twitter). 

When a token is created, token creator might opt-in for "Airdrop" feature, where users are granted with allocation after a token is launched to Uniswap. Allocations are calculated based on the token holdings. Those allocations are not claimable by a user, instead he's offered to tip his allocation for a recipient to claim.
